title: Whats your Favorite Garbage Skin?
body:
To clarify, this is open ended. Whatever you think is crap is fine. But I mean the skins that are old, not flashy, and yet still have a place in your heart. 

For me it's Shurima Desert Zilean. This 8 year old gem has it all:

* Slim clock on his back
* Weird floating rock just off of said clock
* Splash Art that makes him look like an Ayatollah
* Bonkers mustache that is unmatched even by Braum
* Rarely used in game meaning people remember you

There will never be another like it.

replies.body:
Grunge Nunu

It's literal garbage
How can you mention Nunu and not bring up Nunu Bot? D:
Whoa we're talking about _bad_ skins here
Angler Jax, cause getting beat to death with a fishing pole is probably the most humiliating way to die. It's up there with committing seppuku with a frisbee

Nothing beats Armor of the Fifth Age Taric.

Yeah, he got reworked and the skin was technically updated, but they kept all the elements that contribute to it being the most amazing trashy skin in the game. It's beautiful and horrible all at once.

https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/c/c8/Vayne_VindicatorSkin.jpg

Vindicator Vayne
I love that skin, it's so sexy. Vayne looks like Aubrey Plaza, MUH GIRL
I think she is meant to be bayonetta is some regard

She looks like something from a 1990s Scooby Doo porno I love it 

_Oh Curse you Meddling kids! How ever will I get away ;0_
Ninja Rammus.
pre-void kassadin. im a big fan of stories and its pretty cool to see him before he was corrupted by the void. imo we need more like these pre-things for malz and the darkins etc.
Steel Legion lux, I have a hate love relationship with it.
Ikr the splash is somewhat nice and then u look at the spells and model and just say meh

Secret Agent MF was the first skin I bought for her. No particle changes, but amazing theme and splash art. 

It's also somewhat unique, since she's the only female secret agent thus far

Noxus Poppy.

*shivers*

RUSTY BLITZCRANK
The rarest Blitz skin!
Ruthless pantheon {{sticker:sg-lux}} (is it garbage tho)?
He is He-man that automatically make it god tier.
Oh, I gotchu ;)

> [{quoted}](name=Larriet,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=9UEfp9q9,comment-id=00110001,timestamp=2018-06-27T04:20:32.018+0000)
>
> Oh, I gotchu ;)

;){{sticker:sg-syndra}}
Union Jack Fiddlesticks.
you're so valid
Deadpo.. Deadly Kennen

All-Stars Akali. Its just Akali as a football player with no textures nothing but somehow i think she looks neat. 

Plus maybe its going to become super amazing after the rework.

White Mage Veigar. I like the splash art, and it's an alright palette swap for Veigar
Ravager Nocturne. Looks like some skinny yellow... thing. But the old splash looked interesting, and it's a unique look for Nocturne nonetheless.

Riot trist. Lets face it, most of us got this as our first skin. Its free, mostly just a recolor, but it started what got me into getting skins and all. And now somehow through rng crates and the free rng skin rito gifted honoraboe players years ago i now own nearly every trist skin in the game, although i never play trist anymore.

My favourite "trash skin" is probably Goth Annie. It's just a recolour of Annie's base texture but I think that it's probably one of the best ways they decided to go with making a recolour. Looks pretty cool actually, and doesn't feel like shit to own. I bought the champions starter bundle just for that skin, and there are a lot of times that I use it over Red Riding, and Annie in Wonderland.

SKT T1 Jax

He uses a cup. It makes bonking sounds. Riot has yet to make a better skin than this.
Rugged Garen (handsome Garen).

Mercernary Katarina.

It's just a retexture of her base skin, but something about it jsut looks epic.

Warrior Princess Sivir

And every other Sivir skin

The splash arts use to be really bad but they fixed that

But in almost EVERY skin her in game model is super bad

She walks slouched
Her hair looks like a mess
She looks dirty and like she doesnt shower
and what makes it worse is her voice actress sounds like she smoked for 30 years so she looks like shes some random dirty girl

Im not bashing the voice actress, i LOVE her and the quotes too but the visuals that go along with it... nuh uh

Fix them pls

P.S. Im excluding Pizza Sivir cuz that skin is actually pretty nice
Grungy Nunu, cookie monster and oscar.
chosen master yi remains the best master yi skin and will continue to be until the end of days
I always listen to "Duel of the Fates" when I Play Chosen Yi.
Shamrock Malphite. This + taunt will tilt your opponent in the next universe. And i always found it fun.
Bladecraft Orianna.
Forgot what its called, but i live the Blitz skin where he is a truck and Tango TF is baller
Grungy Nunu, he has a literal trashcan on the skin

Red Baron Corki.
It costs a stupid amount of RP essentially for a 520rp reskin that doesnt even look that good.
l o l e

> [{quoted}](name=Mr Meat,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=9UEfp9q9,comment-id=0031,timestamp=2018-06-27T07:07:08.424+0000)
>
> Red Baron Corki.
> It costs a stupid amount of RP essentially for a 520rp reskin that doesnt even look that good.
> l o l e

You know when they put those things back on sale I wanted that skin so badly and I balked at the price. If I played him more I probably would have but mother of god was that pricey. 

Still, those memories of the Peanuts...I cna't let go.
Sewn Chaos Orianna.

Nightmare chogath. Hands down, he's blue.

[](https://lolskinshop.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Nigthmare-Cho-Gath-for-league-of-legends-lol-skin-code-price-rp-ingame-picture-splash-art-model2.png)
Gun Goddess Miss Fortune
Old crabgot
Commando Garen. Cool guy sunglasses will always be the best.
Safari Caitlyn, even though it isnt that trashy but because of it's legacy skin, it'll definitely stand you out.
Most of the Fiddlesticks/Shaco skins just make me disappointed that the champions haven't had a VGU yet.
Renegade Talon because he has amazing blades <3
Silent night Sona

Dreadknight Nasus. I have every Nasus skin except Galactic(I think, I know I didn't buy it but hextech maybe) and I still love using Dreadknight. Hell I got the chroma pack because I dug the Frostbite chroma. Its such a simplistically sexy skin.

Other champions with "better" skins I own that have a lesser skin I really like are Mafia Miss Fortune, Amethyst Ashe, and Leopard Nidalee.  There are honestly probably others, but those are the ones that are popping to the front of my mind right now.
